title: New: Twin Haus – Lumberjack Loveshack (Part I & II)
body:
Having released Part I of _Lumberjack Loveshack_ earlier this year, I’ve eagerly been anticipating the second part to the series, and it doesn’t disappoint.

Combining the two sections, _Lumberjack Loveshack_ comes in at just over nine minutes, and is far and away one of the most ambitious ‘indie’ compositions of recent times. Toying with the jangly **Foals** inspired guitars, and slightly rough yet unique vocals, with a grander production budget, and a full PR blast behind them, Twin Haus could really go somewhere.
